abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews concert of Bartok works performed by pianist Andras Schiff and the Budapest Festival Orchestra, conducted by Ivan Fischer, at Carnegie Hall.
snippet: The Hungarian-born pianist Andras Schiff, presents Bartok and Schubert, with the Budapest Festival Orchestra, conducted by Ivan Fischer, as part of his series of Perspectives concerts.
lead_paragraph: The Hungarian-born pianist Andras Schiff, presents Bartok and Schubert, with the Budapest Festival Orchestra, conducted by Ivan Fischer, as part of his series of Perspectives concerts.

headline.main: Bartok at Home, With a Touch of the Mischievous
headline.print_headline: Bartok at Home, With a Touch of the Mischievous
headline.seo: Budapest Festival Orchestra at Carnegie Hall - Review
